CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starfall Mart relative to Echo Trade?
SRP.A: Starfall Mart is {above} Echo Trade in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Echo Trade relative to Ironwood Market?
SRP.A: Echo Trade is {above} Ironwood Market in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironwood Market relative to Echo Trade?
SRP.A: Ironwood Market is {below} Echo Trade in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total home sales?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Ironwood Market}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total home sales?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Starfall Mart}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Echo Trade's minimum Home Sales in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Echo Trade's minimum Home Sales is in {1958}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Ironwood Market's maximum Home Sales in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Ironwood Market's maximum Home Sales is in {1978}.

NC.Q: Was the total Home Sales in 1958 higher or lower than in 1969?
NC.A: The total home sales in 1958 was {lower} than in 1969.

NC.Q: Between 1956 and 1964, was the average total Home Sales higher or lower than between 1961 and 1972?
NC.A: The average total home sales between 1956 and 1964 was {lower} than between 1961 and 1972.

NC.Q: Was the total Home Sales in 1952 higher or lower than in 1971?
NC.A: The total home sales in 1952 was {lower} than in 1971.

NC.Q: Between 1970 and 1975, was the average total Home Sales higher or lower than between 1958 and 1963?
NC.A: The average total home sales between 1970 and 1975 was {higher} than between 1958 and 1963.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Ironwood Market} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Echo Trade and Ironwood Market first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Echo Trade and Ironwood Market first exchanged leading positions in {1953}.
